verses.name: Ezra 10:3
verses.text: Now therefore let us make a covenant with our God to put away all the wives, and such as are born of them, according to the counsel of my lord, and of those that tremble at the commandment of our God; and let it be done according to the law.

verses.name: Ezra 10:4
verses.text: Arise; for this matter belongeth unto thee: we also will be with thee: be of good courage, and do it.

verses.name: Ezra 10:5
verses.text: Then arose Ezra, and made the chief priests, the Levites, and all Israel, to swear that they should do according to this word. And they sware.
